mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, I.* from (select w.work_seq from work_info w, file_table f where f.work_seq=w.work_seq and w.user_num=#{user_num} and w.upload_check='승인' and f.file_kind=#{file_kind}) I) where R between #{rowNum.startRow} and #{rowNum.lastRow}
select work_seq from file_table where file_num=#{file_num}

select * from (select rownum R, I.* from (select f.file_num, f.work_seq, f.file_name, f.file_kind, w.user_num, w.sell, w.upload_check from work_info w, file_table f where f.work_seq=w.work_seq and user_num=#{user_num} and w.upload_check='승인' and file_kind=#{file_kind}) I) where R between #{rowNum.startRow} and #{rowNum.lastRow}
